artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: See individual description below.  Early samples probably from school.  There were always sample warps on the Structos and other small looms in the studio.  Usually natural fibers, one or a mixture, and natural color.  None of these were in the line. Cream warp and weft.  Very loose weave. (cream)

title: Casement Samples
